ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by grunweg.
The build still has a linter failure - it will not pass bors as-is. Can you please fix this? Thanks :-)

Thanks! Please remove the commented alias also, and fix the build (a one-line fix for the longFile linter).
